content.subtitle: Lifetime cover
content.paragraph: All boiler servicing and repairs, including parts and labour, are covered by your monthly payment for the lifetime of the Heating Plan. At the end of the term, your plan will end and you'll own the boiler. Alternatively, you can get in touch with us to find out more about upgrading to a new boiler and plan.

content.subtitle: Fixed price guarantee
content.paragraph: Our quotes are competitive and fixed. Unlike some boiler heating plans, we don't charge any other fees and our costs will stay fixed for the full term. No call-out fees, no excess costs, no up-front payment and no inflationary increases.

content.subtitle: Satisfaction pledge
content.paragraph: We only partner with Gas Safe registered engineers who install the highest quality boilers and maintain them with care. We don't involve third parties or sub-contract, so you know exactly who you are dealing with.

content.subtitle: Replacement protection
content.paragraph: Our plan is so much more than a way of financing your boiler. It covers your boiler, so essential repairs can be carried out and if it can't be repaired, it'll be replaced free of charge, giving you that Warmly feeling.
